inventory=[{"type": "red_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 43, "index": 13}, {"type": "brewing_stand", "quantity": 29, "index": 15}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 4, "index": 17}, {"type": "music_disc_wait", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "red_mushroom", "quantity": 55, "index": 29}, {"type": "magenta_concrete_powder", "quantity": 8, "index": 30}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 25, "index": 34}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 45, "index": 36}, {"type": "zoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 15, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft white_wool, I need to place 4 strings on top of each other in the crafting grid. The first string is in slot 17, so I will move it to the first slot of the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1
